executable.title: Uniform Remesh
executable.description: Remesh a surface model using gpytoolbox's uniform remeshing algorithm.
executable.acknowledgements: This work integrates gpytoolbox uniform remeshing into a Slicer CLI.

parameters.label: Remeshing Parameters
parameters.description: Controls for the uniform remeshing filter.

double.name: targetEdgeLength
double.label: Target Edge Length
double.description: Desired average edge length in model units. Use 0 to estimate automatically from the input.

integer.name: numberOfIterations
integer.label: Number of Iterations
integer.description: How many remeshing iterations to execute. More iterations improve uniformity but increase runtime.

boolean.name: projectToInputSurface
boolean.label: Project To Input Surface
boolean.description: Project remeshed vertices back to the original surface after each iteration. Recommended when working with open boundaries.
